## Plugin Type
- [ ] New plugin
- [ ] Update existing plugin (name: ________)

## Purpose
What should this plugin do? (e.g., notify, control hardware, integrate with service)

## Triggers / Inputs
- Telegram keywords or message patterns?
- External events or webhooks?
- UI interactions?

## Actions / Outputs
What actions should it perform? (e.g., send message, control LEDs, call API)

## Configuration Needs
List settings required (API keys, device IDs, options). Include validation rules if any.

## UI Requirements
Describe the UI elements (cards, buttons, fields, status labels). Mockups welcome.

## Dependencies
List external services/libraries and any rate limits or auth steps.

## Testing Notes
How to verify the plugin works (steps, expected results, test data).

## Additional Context
Any extra details, constraints, or references.
